title: Gem, Mineral, Fossil & Jewelry Show to bedazzle local rock hounds
description: The 63rd annual Gem, Mineral, Fossil & Jewelry Show takes place Saturday, March 7, from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. and Sunday, March 8, from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.

title: A guide to Athens, where ancient sites coexist with modern life
description: Ancient relics have been given a fresh lease of life in the Greek capital, where they’ve been reimagined and reworked to coexist with the 21st-century city, from fashion stores to classical-music venues.

title: From ancient empires to Epstein, patriarchy keeps shielding the men in charge
description: Marnie Cook Although the United States did not invent patriarchy- its roots lie in ancient Mesopotamia, in the region we now know as Iraq, Syria, and Turkey-it remains...

title: Ancient Chinese Practice Lowers Blood Pressure Naturally
description: An ancient Chinese mind-body practice can lower a person’s blood pressure as well as medication or a program of brisk walking, a new study says.

title: Popular Fossil watch with nearly 20,000 reviews drops by whopping 40 per cent
description: It’s dropped to under $180 for a limited time.
